name: Sleepless: A Midsummer Night's Dream
storyline:
Ryohei Takamiya is a university student who will be staying for a week as a tutor at the western style building known as the Black Rose Mansion which lies deep within the mountains. The hall is occupied by three women, the bewitching Marie Mamiya her spoiled genius daughter Maria and the well endowed cold and expressionless Aira, the live in maid.
Takamiya is entrusted with tutoring Maria who he soon finds out is a beautiful but selfish girl. It's not long before all three women tempt him, as the three lust after him hungry to drown in pleasure, as he is pulled deeper into their world, the gears of fate begin to turn....
What future awaits Ryohei? Will it be heaven or will it be hell? The doors to the Black Rose Mansion are now open......
